fr.hes.raynaudmonitoring.util

Class SystemUiHiderBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.hes.raynaudmonitoring.util.SystemUiHider
      • fr.hes.raynaudmonitoring.util.SystemUiHiderBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SystemUiHiderHoneycomb

    public class SystemUiHiderBase
extends SystemUiHider
    A base implementation of SystemUiHider. Uses APIs available in all API levels to show and hide the status bar.

    • Field Detail

      • mVisible

        private boolean mVisible
        Whether or not the system UI is currently visible. This is a cached value from calls to hide() and show().
